  • public class AI
extends Player
    This class handles all the actions the AI player can make.

    2.0
    Author:
    Group 1 - DAT055 2014

    • Constructor Detail

      • AI

        public AI(int difficulties,
  Battlefield opponent,
  ZoneListener listener)
        the constructor of this class
        Parameters:
        difficulties - The difficulty of this AI, from 0 (easiest) to 4 (hardest)
        battlefield - A reference to our opponents battlefield
        listener - A listener handling changes to our own battlefield

        public void placeShips()
        Placing out the ships and it will override the Player class method placeShips() and call the method setShip()

      • attack

        AIs turn to attack
        Parameters:
        lastShot - An enum telling us what happened on the last shot
        Returns:

      • isShipsPlaced

        public boolean isShipsPlaced()
        Returns:
